TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlDecryptionTransform extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform

Docs.summary: Specifies the order of XML Digital Signature and XML Encryption operations when both are performed on the same document.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The XmlDecryptionTransform class provides a transform that determines the order of XML Digital Signature and XML Encryption operations when both are performed on the same document.
Use the XmlDecryptionTransform class whenever you need to perform XML encryption and apply an XML digital signature to the same XML document.
You must pass an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> object to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.EncryptedXml%2A> property that contains the necessary key information to decrypt the document.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

Docs.param: A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to exclude from processing
Docs.summary: Adds a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to exclude from processing.
Gets or sets an object that contains information about the keys necessary to decrypt an XML document.
Docs.value: An object that contains information about the keys necessary to decrypt an XML document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks You must pass an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> object to the EncryptedXml property that contains the necessary key information to decrypt the document.

Docs.summary: Returns an XML representation of the parameters of an object that are suitable to be included as subelements of an XMLDSIG element.
Docs.returns: A list of the XML nodes that represent the transform-specific content needed to describe the current object in an XMLDSIG element.

Docs.returns: The output of the current object.
Docs.exception: A decryption key could not be found.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object GetOutput(class System.Type type) cil managed

Docs.param: The type of the output to return. is the only valid type for this parameter.
Docs.summary: Returns the output of the current object.
Docs.returns: The output of the current object.
Docs.exception: The parameter is not an object.

Docs.summary: Gets an array of types that are valid inputs to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.LoadInput%2A> method of the current object.
Docs.value: An array of valid input types for the current object; you can pass only objects of one of these types to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.LoadInput%2A> method of the current object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The array returned by the InputTypes property must contain at least one element because every <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform> object must accept at least one type as valid input.
An <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform> object typically accepts one or more of the following types as input: <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, or <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void LoadInnerXml(class System.Xml.XmlNodeList nodeList) cil managed

Docs.param: An object that specifies transform-specific content for the current object.
Docs.summary: Parses the specified object as transform-specific content of a element and configures the internal state of the current object to match the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is used to process subelements of a `<Transform>` element.

-or-
The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) value of an object in was not found.

-or-

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void LoadInput(object obj) cil managed

Docs.param: The input to load into the current object.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, loads the specified input into the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The type of the input object must be one of the types in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.InputTypes%2A> property.

Docs.summary: Gets an array of types that are possible outputs from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.GetOutput%2A> methods of the current object.
Docs.value: An array of valid output types for the current object; only objects of one of these types are returned from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.GetOutput%2A> methods of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The array returned by the OutputTypes property must contain at least one element because every transform must generate at least one type as output.
